title: Friendly reminder: "Grievous injuries" kill
body:
I just have a game against a Swain, an Akali and a Vayne with a ton of "lifesteal". And my whole team refused to buy "grievous injuries" because "that doesn't do damage".

This is why I lose games. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
